target_name: 국가정책, 전략 및 계획에 기후변화 조치 통합

en.target: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
en.title: Number of countries that have communicated the establishment or operationalization of an integrated policy/strategy/plan which increases their ability to adapt to the adverse impacts of climate change, and foster climate resilience and low greenhouse gas emissions development in a manner that does not threaten food production (including a national adaptation plan, nationally determined contribution, national communication, biennial update report or other)
en.indicator_name: Total greenhouse gas emissions per year
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
en.data_keywords: Non-statistical, legislation, policy, Sexual Health, Education
en.source_url_1: Climate Change Act  /  UK Climate Change Risk Assessment 2017
en.page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**
▶ Data type: National data (Type1) This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators. Download the national metadata file for more information.
